ssot__ServicePresenceStatus__dlm.name: Service Presence Status
ssot__ServicePresenceStatus__dlm.description: The Service Presence Status DMO represents a status that can be assigned to a service channel, such as available for leads, out for lunch, or busy.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the service presence status DMO.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the service presence status.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the service presence status.
